message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.NI 

The paper deals with the construction of MDS array codes for distributed storage systems, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the reduction of field order, which is a topic related to data structures (cs.DS) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The use of XOR operations for optimal repair is a topic related to systems and control (cs.SI) and networked information systems (cs.NI).
